title: Good Morning Football Podcast Episode 3
itunes:title: Good Morning Football Podcast Episode 3
description:
On Episode 3 of the GMFB Podcast, the hosts recap their respective weeks (1:13); discuss the Cam Newton dress code violation/suspension (5:45); give some Week 13 Takeaways (16:28); interview GMFB Producer J.B. Kritz (22:25); discuss things they’ve done 201 times in honor of Tom Brady’s record-setting win (44:18); look ahead to the Week 14 slate of games(49:36); and answer you Twitter questions (54:06).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
